books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the Italian Renaissance polymath which connects his work in various disciplines.
books.name: LEONARDO DA VINCI

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the Union general of the Civil War and two-term president of the United States.
books.name: GRANT

books.author: by Pete Souza
books.description: More than 300 pictures of the former president by his White House photographer, with behind-the-scenes stories.
books.name: OBAMA

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Joe Biden
books.description: The former vice president recalls his toughest year in office, as his son battled brain cancer.
books.name: PROMISE ME, DAD

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: Major General Jackson takes on the British in Louisiana.
books.name: ANDREW JACKSON AND THE MIRACLE OF NEW ORLEANS

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Major events and battles during the Revolutionary War are told from several perspectives.
books.name: KILLING ENGLAND

books.author: by Chris Matthews
books.description: The New York senator's journey from his formative years to his tragic run for president.
books.name: BOBBY KENNEDY

books.author: by Jenna Bush Hager and Barbara Pierce Bush. Illustrated by Ramona Kaulitzki
books.description: How the twin daughters of former president George W. Bush grew up in the public eye.
books.name: SISTERS FIRST

books.author: by Hillary Clinton
books.description: An inside look at her campaign and how she recovered in its aftermath.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED

books.author: by Luke Harding
books.description: The British journalist recounts his meeting with the former MI6 officer Christopher Steele and makes his case for a connection between Moscow and Donald Trump.
books.name: COLLUSION

books.author: by Scott Kelly
books.description: A memoir by the retired astronaut and former commander of the International Space Station.
books.name: ENDURANCE

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON
